channel.title: Games on Leonardo Borges
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Leonardo Borges

item.title: fallingdreams my very own tetris clone
item.description: This will come as no surprise to my closest friends, but I am a long time game development admirer. Although I've never done anything professionally I did spend some time in the past studying this amazingly interesting field - it's my dark hobby. As hardware evolves and gamers demand more and more reality from their consoles, the game development industry is one of the few that basically didn't suffer with the latest economic crisis.
